description: Comprehensive adversarial corpus for security and performance testing

files.name: adversarial_large.json
files.desc: Large token corpus (5k tokens, mixed links)

files.name: adversarial_deep_nesting.json
files.desc: Deep nesting (2000 levels) to test nesting limits

files.name: adversarial_regex_pathological.json
files.purpose: ReDoS (Regular Expression Denial of Service) prevention

files.name: adversarial_html_xss.json
files.desc: HTML/XSS vectors (script tags, event handlers, SVG)

files.name: adversarial_template_injection.json
files.desc: Template injection vectors (Jinja, EJS, ERB, etc.)

files.name: adversarial_encoded_urls_raw.json
files.desc: Raw URL variants for encoding tests

files.name: adversarial_combined.json
files.desc: Combined small corpus exercising multiple vectors

files.name: adversarial_attrget.json
files.desc: Token with href sentinel 'RAISE_ATTRGET' to simulate attrGet raising

files.name: adversarial_oversized_tables.json
files.desc: Oversized table: 1000 rows Ã— 100 columns (100K cells total)
files.purpose: Table parser memory limits and O(N) performance testing

files.name: adversarial_huge_lists.json
files.desc: Huge list: 10,000 items with 50+ nesting levels
files.purpose: List collector O(N) performance and deep nesting handling

files.name: adversarial_bidi_attacks.json
files.desc: BiDi control characters (U+202E, U+200F, etc.) for visual spoofing
files.purpose: Visual spoofing prevention, text direction attack detection

files.name: adversarial_unicode_exploits.json
files.desc: Unicode exploits: NUL bytes, overlong UTF-8, invalid sequences, homoglyphs

files.name: adversarial_malicious_uris.json
files.desc: Malicious URI schemes: javascript:, data:, file:, vbscript:, blob:, etc.
